company.name: First Response Tree Service
company.tagline: Exemplifying honesty, integrity, and professionalism in every job that we do.
company.description: First Response Tree Service has the knowledge, equipment, and personnel to handle all of your tree related needs. We are owned and operated by local firefighters that take pride in performing a job well done while taking every measure to ensure minimal impact to your property. Honesty, transparency, and communication with our customers is a top priority.

hero.title: Professional Tree Services
hero.subtitle: Serving all of greater Cincinnati with expert tree care by local firefighters

services.name: Complete Tree Removal
services.shortDescription: Safe and efficient tree removal services for hazardous or unwanted trees.
services.fullDescription: Complete tree removal is often necessary due to several factors that can include overall tree health, encroachment in unwanted areas, and potential safety concerns for the property owner.
features: Specializing in complex or difficult access tree removal
Prioritizing protection of lawn and property

services.name: Tree Pruning & Trimming
services.shortDescription: Periodic professional pruning keeps trees happy and healthy, as well as keeping your property safe.
services.fullDescription: Many homeowners don't consider the health of their trees until it is too late. Regular pruning, shaping, and dead-wooding are all great ways to keep your trees happy, healthy, and looking great. Falling limbs can also pose a serious risk to both adults and children who may be in or around the area under the tree canopy.

services.name: 24/7 Emergency Service
services.shortDescription: Quick response for storm damage and emergency tree situations.
services.fullDescription: Mother nature seems to find a way to disrupt our busy lives at the most inopportune times. Strong winds, heavy rains, and ice can wreak havoc on weak trees. Let First Response Tree Service come to the rescue day or night. We can work directly with your insurance company if needed to ensure your property is back to normal as quick as possible.

services.name: Land & Vegetation Clearing
services.shortDescription: Clearing overgrowth and unwanted vegetation to enhance your property.
services.fullDescription: Clearing overgrowth and unwanted vegetation is an excellent way to increase your green space and enhance the aesthetics of your property. Whether you're planning to build a structure or just want to beautify your space, land clearing is an excellent option to accomplish either one.

about.title: Expert Tree Care by Local Firefighters
about.description: We are owned and operated by local firefighters that take pride in performing a job well done while taking every measure to ensure minimal impact to your property. When working at your home or business we take the necessary precautions to ensure we are performing the work in the safest, most efficient manner possible.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: Outstanding service from local firefighters who really know their stuff. Professional, safe, and cleaned up perfectly!

testimonials.name: Mike Thompson
testimonials.text: Called for emergency tree removal after the storm. They were there within 2 hours and handled everything professionally.

testimonials.name: Jennifer Davis
testimonials.text: Great communication, fair pricing, and excellent work. Will definitely use them again for tree maintenance.
